name: APOLLEO
description:
Leonardo is a painter/restorator, he used to preserve artwork all other the city, but infamous citizen, children and bird are dirtying the paints all over the day.

Enter into the boots of Leonardo, and clean, restaure, and honor the memory of all the famous painters all over the world !

Team Leader & Main Dev : Cortex

Game Designer & Off Dev : NeM

2D Graphist : Arwesh

Audio Designers :Ludwig Swamp & Junn
